work.work-title: In our work and in our play

encoding.software: PDFtoMusic Pro v1.6.5 Build 1B9E7 (c) Myriad - http://www.myriad-online.com

credit.credit-words: May we in Thy strength subdue Evil tempers, words untrue, Thoughts impure, and deeds unkind, All things hateful to Thy mind.
Refrain. Then we truthfully can sing, We are children of the King.
In our work and in our play
Children of the King are we! May we loyal to Him be; Try to please Him every day, In our work and in our play.
